name: Blaster_Ranged.Radiation_Blast
display_help: Blast your foes with lethal radiation. Radiation Blast powers can bypass normal defenses, and lower your targets' overall Defense.

powers.name: Blaster_Ranged.Radiation_Blast.Neutrino_Bolt
powers.display_help: A very quick, but low damage attack. Neutrino Bolt can reduce the target's Defense. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

display_info: -7.00% strength to defense for 3s on target
6.60% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 8.5s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Ranged.Radiation_Blast.X-Ray_Beam
powers.display_help: You can emit a beam of X-Ray energy from your eyes, dealing moderate Energy damage. This attack can bypass some defenses and can reduce the target's Defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

display_info: -14.00% strength to defense for 6s on target
11.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 9.17s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Ranged.Radiation_Blast.Irradiate
powers.display_help: You can emit lethal amounts of radiation in all directions, damaging all nearby foes for a short time. Like other Radiation attacks, this power can bypass some of a target's defenses. Irradiate severely reduces the target's Defense. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow

display_info: 10 ticks of 6.26 energy damage over 4.6s on target

powers.name: Blaster_Ranged.Radiation_Blast.Electron_Haze
powers.display_help: A short range conical blast of free electrons. This attack can bypass some of a target's defenses and reduce the target's Defense. It can also knock some targets down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Close, Moderate Cone DMG(Energy), Foe -DEF, Knockback

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 40 ft. radius 30° arc (10 targets max)

powers.name: Blaster_Ranged.Radiation_Blast.Aim
powers.display_help: Greatly increases the chance to hit of your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage. Recharge: Long

display_info: 62.50% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Ranged.Radiation_Blast.Proton_Volley
powers.display_help: Hurls a volley of alpha particles over an extremely long range. Proton Volley can bypass some of a target's defenses and reduce the target's Defense. This is a sniper attack, and is best fired from a distance as it can be interrupted. If you are engaged in battle this attack becomes instant-cast. If you are not engaged, it will do bonus damage. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Blaster_Ranged.Radiation_Blast.Cosmic_Burst
powers.display_help: Cosmic Burst smashes the target with cosmic particles. The attack is devastating and can leave most targets Disoriented and with reduced Defense. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Moderate

display_info: -21.00% strength to defense for 12s on target
13.70% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 9.57s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Ranged.Radiation_Blast.Neutron_Bomb
powers.display_help: This devastating attack lobs an explosive sphere of deadly radiation, damaging the target and all nearby foes. Neutron Bomb can bypass some of a target's defenses and reduce the target's Defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Blaster_Ranged.Radiation_Blast.Atomic_Blast
powers.display_help: This attack taps most of your stored energy to deal a devastating Atomic Blast which deals Extreme Energy and Smashing damage. Any foes left standing will have their Defense greatly reduced and may be left helplessly choking on toxic vapors. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long
